name: Severstal
description: Severstal is a leading Russian steel and mining company, recognized for its high-quality steel products and a significant player in the global steel market. Founded in 1955 and headquartered in Cherepovets, Russia, Severstal operates a diverse range of businesses, including steel production, mining, and metal processing. The company’s steel division produces a wide variety of flat and long steel products for various industries, including construction, automotive, and energy. Severstal also owns and operates several iron ore and coal mining assets, ensuring a stable supply of raw materials for its steel production. The company is committed to sustainable development and innovation, focusing on reducing its environmental impact while improving efficiency and productivity. Severstal’s strategic initiatives include investments in advanced technologies and the development of new steel grades that meet the evolving needs of customers worldwide. As part of its growth strategy, Severstal actively seeks to expand its market presence both domestically and internationally, positioning itself as a reliable partner in the global steel supply chain.
